# Hello there, welcome!

I am a Doctoral Candidate in Earth & Environment at Boston University. I investigate large-scale ocean atmosphere interactions pertaining to Kuroshio Extension variations and their linkages with marine heatwaves, advised by Prof. Bruce Anderson.
